description: Editing of law journals, research & writing of case notes, reviews & essays for a journal and preparation of the journal for publication.
prerequisites: Successful completion of 32 units of LAWS courses and permission from Head of School
restricted: Restricted to students enrolled in the LLB(Hons)(64), LLB(Hons)(48), LLB, LLB (Graduate Entry), LLB(Hons) duals and LLB dual programs
